result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin Allen Castner #520158 was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Delivery of Methamphetamine, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(e)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Consecutive to Eau Claire Co. Case No. 14 CF 786.

superMiscConds.notes: Defendant is to pay court costs.
Defendant is to comply with any treatment/programming as deemed appropriate by the COMPAS assessment and agent.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Court grants request for adjournment.  3:41 pm:  William Nemer for the State; Def appeared in person w/atty Nicholas Layland.  Def wishes to waive right to PH.  Court advised Def of rights.
